General.Name: Big Technologies PLC
General.Description: Big Technologies PLC, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and delivery of remote monitoring technologies and services to the offender and remote personal monitoring industry under the Buddi brand name in the Americas, Europe, and the Asia-Pacific. The company's criminal justice solution includes proprietary cloud-based monitoring software platform with modular hardware that allow real time monitoring. It also provides remote care solution consisting of wristband that offers automatic fall-detection, emergency alert, location tracking, and 24/7 customer support services. Big Technologies PLC was founded in 2005 and is based in Rickmansworth, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Talbot House, Rickmansworth, United Kingdom, WD3 1DE
